name: Unity Project Prototypes
description:
These Prototypes Are Bare Bones w/o really Any Polish... 

  1. Tap E Square: A Flappy Bird Clone. 
  2. Tic-Tac-Toe: Tic-Tac-Toe Game. 
  3. Mega Simon: Repeat a progressively longer pattern after the computer.  
  4. Pongey: A Pong clone. 
  5. Click E: Create a Clicker Game (Incremental Game). 
  6. Dodge Enator: Move horizontally to avoid falling blocks. 
  7. bb: An aa replica. 
  8. Stack Enator: A stacking game.  
  9. B_U: a“Be Yourself” clone. 
  10. Aclock : An analog clock of the real local time with other extra statistics. 
  11. Outblock : A block busting game. 
  12. Oodle Jump : A Doodle Jump clone. 
  13. Bulletin: A top-down shooter prototype. (Inspired by Alternative Bullet by nomi)
  14. Aplatformer: A bare bones platformer prototype. 
  15. Snaike: A Snake clone. 
  16. Memry: A match 2 game. 
  17. Aquiz: Bare bones functionality of a quiz.  
  18. Typee: A simple typing test.
